title: The widowes treasure plentifully furnished with sundry precious and approoued secretes in phisicke and chirurgery for the health and pleasure of mankinde : hereunto are adioyned, sundry pretie practises and conclusions of cookerie : with many profitable and holesome medicines for sundrie diseases in cattell.
author: Partridge, John, fl. 1566-1573.
publisher: Printed by Edward Alde, for Edward White,
notes: Attributed to John Partridge by STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: wormholed, and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in: Harvard University. Library.
